name: FOWL Tech Presents, Typing in the Modern Era!
name_original: FOWL Tech Presents, Typing in the Modern Era!
description:
EDIT: So, uh, just to be clear to anybody still finding this for the GMTK Jam, feel free to rate this low even if you liked it. I didn't realize until after posting that the only scoring metric for this jam was good design and the whole joke of the game is how horrible the actual game's design is. I pretty much had only noticed the theme and didn't pay attention to everything else he said about what the jam was about. It's fair to say I goofed up there but I'm glad people liked the jokes. As a wise sonic game once taught me, "Live and learn". 

EDIT 2: And of course you can also rate the game low if you thought it was hot garbage. I don't want to be as delusional as the narrator.

"FOWL Tech is  proud to announce... the future! And we've blessed you with the opportunity to see it. You're welcome. Now go! Behold greatness."

A rather silly typing game with a voiced story but without typing

Instructions - Use mouse to click the things you need to click

Story mode requires audio for it to make sense

A game by Sfowl for the GMTK Game Jam 2018

Made in Unity. All sounds and artwork (literally just the title) are custom.

(Voice was inspired by Cave Johnson and that one announcer in the line for the Indiana Jones ride in California's Disneyland)

Twitter - https://twitter.com/Sfowldev
